definition: rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: This wine is fermented in older French ock and aged on lees for 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 這款霞多麗在舊法國桶內成年12個月以上。

sentences.english: In the tradition of a true Burgundian-style Chardonnay, there's an understated power that runs from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 擁有傳統的勃艮第霞多麗的風格，口感飽滿豐腴。
